Orchard Computer Solutions

Local to the Waterlooville area, Orchard Computer Solutions is a small and independent business aiming to deliver expertise with good value for money.

Services

Here is a list of the kind of work that I can do, but it does not stop here! Please get in touch with any issues you might be facing.

Data Recovery and Transfer

Internet Connectivity Issues

More:

  • Windows and general Troubleshooting
  • Wi-Fi setup and advice
  • Copy / move data between computers
  • Improve speed of slow computers
  • Virus and malware removal
  • Fix computers failing to start
  • Upgrade to Solid State Drives
  • Recover lost data
  • Build new systems available for purchase

About

This website is under construction.

Orchard Computer Solutions is a small business in the Waterlooville area, with expertise in almost all aspects of computer support from troubleshooting software to upgrading your PC. I specialise in hardware, particularly the design and construction of new systems, and upgrading existing ones.

Pricing

Pricing is both low and simple: for callouts I charge £25 for the first hour and £10 for every half-hour thereafter.

Where purchases need to be made (such as replacement parts), the cost will depend on the price of the components.

Every situation is different, so feel free to get in touch to discuss the problems.

Contact

Get in contact to place an order, book a consultation, or request a service. Use the form below, or send an email directly to contact@orchardcomputersolutions.co.uk
